title: Keeping time: How musical training may boost cognition
content:
by M. Florencia Assaneo, Fernando Lizcano-Cort√©s, Pablo Ripolles

The relationship between musical training and intellect is controversial. A new hypothesis may help resolve the debate by proposing an explanation for how training in rhythmic skills can improve cognitive abilities in some individuals, but not others.
